Converts a numeric value to {{lc|std::wstring}}.

{{rrev multi|until1=c++26
|rev1=
Let {{tti|buf}} be an internal to the conversion functions buffer, sufficiently large to contain the result of conversion.

@1@ Converts a signed decimal integer to a wide string as if by {{c|std::swprintf(buf, sz, L"%d", value)}}.
@2@ Converts a signed decimal integer to a wide string as if by {{c|std::swprintf(buf, sz, L"%ld", value)}}.
@3@ Converts a signed decimal integer to a wide string  as if by {{c|std::swprintf(buf, sz, L"%lld", value)}}.
@4@ Converts an unsigned decimal integer to a wide string as if by {{c|std::swprintf(buf, sz, L"%u", value)}}.
@5@ Converts an unsigned decimal integer to a wide string as if by {{c|std::swprintf(buf, sz, L"%lu", value)}}.
@6@ Converts an unsigned decimal integer to a wide string as if by {{c|std::swprintf(buf, sz, L"%llu", value)}}.
@7,8@ Converts a floating point value to a wide string as if by {{c|std::swprintf(buf, sz, L"%f", value)}}.
@9@ Converts a floating point value to a wide string as if by {{c|std::swprintf(buf, sz, L"%Lf", value)}}.
|rev2=
@1-9@ Converts a numeric value to a wide string as if by {{c|std::format(L"{}", value)}}.
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|value|a numeric value to convert}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A wide string holding the converted value.

===Exceptions===
May throw {{lc|std::bad_alloc}} from the {{lc|std::wstring}} constructor.

===Example===
{{example|
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;string&gt;

int main()
{
    for (const double f : {23.43, 1e-9, 1e40, 1e-40, 123456789.0})
        std::wcout &lt;&lt; "std::wcout: " &lt;&lt; f &lt;&lt; '\n'
                   &lt;&lt; "to_wstring: " &lt;&lt; std::to_wstring(f) &lt;&lt; "\n\n";
}
|output=
std::wcout: 23.43
to_wstring: 23.430000

std::wcout: 1e-09
to_wstring: 0.000000

std::wcout: 1e+40
to_wstring: 10000000000000000303786028427003666890752.000000

std::wcout: 1e-40
to_wstring: 0.000000

std::wcout: 1.23457e+08
to_wstring: 123456789.000000
}}
